bug.author: aoltonen
bug.summary: A problem puzzles me when running DQNdrone.py.
bug.description: When I was running the DQNdrone.py in Windows, I met a problem. The drone collides with some object ( Like a wire or iron tower) after hundreds of steps and it just stagnates there and won't go back to the initial postion. No error is reported and the runing process pauses. I wonder how to solve the problem and make the drone go on training.

comments.comment: There is a new script that has replaced DQNdrone.py at \AirSim\PythonClient\reinforcement_learning\dqn_drone.py. Please retest with the new script and report back if you see any issues.
